-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | set group and user id before running server
--   
--   <pre>
--   runTLSSocketWithID tlss settings sock ("user", "bob") app
--   </pre>
@package warp-tls-uid
@version 0.1.0.4

module Network.Wai.Handler.WarpTLS.UID
runTLSSocket :: FilePath -> FilePath -> Settings -> Socket -> Application -> IO ()
runTLSSocketWithID :: TLSSettings -> Settings -> Socket -> (Group, User) -> Application -> IO ()
tlsSettings :: FilePath -> FilePath -> TLSSettings
type Group = String
type User = String
